description: Check if an object has a specific property/key.

inputs.name: object
inputs.description: The object to check for the property

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: The name of the property to check for

outputs.name: has_property
outputs.description: Whether the object has the specified property

outputs.name: value
outputs.description: The value of the property if it exists, null otherwise

settings.name: check_own_properties
settings.description: If true, only check own properties (not inherited). If false, check the entire prototype chain.
